* Read/review pages 26-32 PDS as needed.
* This week you will "work with data".
* Watch the [Working with Data video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d9TgAspq9bA&index=52&list=PLDEF0B9CBD27AD37E) (41 min)
* Watch the [Data Management video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=thGk4CUEXQ8&list=PLDEF0B9CBD27AD37E&index=53) (39 min)
* Complete you peer grading evaluations for the **Research Plan Assignment** NLT 5 PM February 13.
* Submit via [http://www.crowdgrader.org](http://www.crowdgrader.org) the **Data Management Assignment** NLT 5 PM February 20. Directions: Select three secondary categorical variables from the data set you are using.  Recode your data to create factors with appropriate labels.  Create a barplot for each of your factors and write a sentence or two explaining each barplot.  Show all `R` code used to manage and create your barplots by using `R` code chunks in your `*.Rmd` file.  Submit the resulting `*.html` file to crowdgrader.
The direct link for the **Data Management Assignment** is [http://www.crowdgrader.org/crowdgrader/venues/view_venue/804](http://www.crowdgrader.org/crowdgrader/venues/view_venue/804).
